package_description: This 3 Nights / 4 Days package is perfect for those who want to fully explore the beauty of Srinagar, the crown jewel of Kashmir. Stay in a traditional houseboat on Dal Lake, enjoy a Shikara ride, visit the serene Mughal Gardens, and explore the vibrant markets of Srinagar. This itinerary offers a perfect blend of relaxation, sightseeing, and cultural experiences. Whether you are a honeymoon couple, a family, or a solo traveler, this package allows you to experience the soul of Kashmir at a leisurely pace.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Shikara Ride
details: Arrive at Srinagar Airport & transfer to the hotel/houseboat
Enjoy a Shikara Ride on Dal Lake
Relax & admire the scenic beauty
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Mughal Gardens & Sightseeing Tour
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Visit Shankaracharya Temple & Mughal Gardens
Explore Dal Lake & Hazratbal Shrine
Enjoy shopping at local bazaars
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Local Culture & Shopping
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Visit Pari Mahal, Tulip Garden & Botanical Garden
Enjoy authentic Kashmiri Wazwan cuisine
Free time for shopping (Pashmina, saffron, carpets)
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Departure from Srinagar
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Transfer to Srinagar Airport for your return flight

Trip Overview.Experience: Houseboat stay, Shikara ride, Mughal gardens, cultural exploration

inclusions: Shikara Ride on Dal Lake (1 Hour)
Visit to Mughal Gardens & Shankaracharya Temple

things-to-do.title: Arrival & Leisure:
details: Check-in to a houseboat or hotel & relax
Enjoy a Shikara Ride on Dal Lake in the evening
Witness a beautiful sunset over the Zabarwan Mountains

things-to-do.title: Mughal Gardens & Old Srinagar Tour:
details: Visit Shankaracharya Temple for panoramic views
Explore the famous Mughal Gardens:
Shalimar Bagh (The Garden of Love) - Nishat Bagh (The Garden of Bliss) - Chashme Shahi (The Royal Spring)
Visit the Hazratbal Shrine near Dal Lake
Stroll through the local bazaars of Lal Chowk

things-to-do.title: Cultural & Shopping Experience:
details: Explore the Tulip Garden (Seasonal - March to April)
Visit the Pari Mahal & Botanical Garden
Enjoy shopping for Pashmina shawls, carpets & saffron
Indulge in authentic Kashmiri cuisine (Try Rogan Josh & Kahwa)

things-to-do.title: Departure
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Drop-off at Srinagar Airport for your return flight

package_name: Fairytale Gateway to Srinagar and Gulmarg: 3 Nights 4 Days
package_description: Explore the enchanting beauty of Kashmir with this 3 Nights / 4 Days tour covering Srinagar and Gulmarg. Start your journey in Srinagar, the Venice of the East, and enjoy a Shikara ride on Dal Lake, visit Mughal Gardens, and experience a houseboat stay. Head to Gulmarg, the winter paradise, for an exciting Gondola ride and snow adventures. Whether you are a honeymooner, a family traveler, or a solo explorer, this package offers the perfect balance of relaxation and adventure.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Local Sightseeing
details: Arrive at Srinagar Airport & transfer to your hotel/houseboat
Enjoy a Shikara ride on Dal Lake
Visit Shankaracharya Temple & Mughal Gardens
Explore Lal Chowk market for Kashmiri handicrafts
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Excursion to Gulmarg
details: Breakfast at the hotel & drive to Gulmarg (Approx. 2-hour drive)
Take the Gondola ride up to Phase 1 for panoramic views
Enjoy snow activities (Skiing, Snowboarding, Sledging – optional)
Explore local attractions like Maharani Temple & St. Mary’s Church
Dinner & overnight stay in Gulmarg

itinerary.title: Return to Srinagar & Sightseeing
details: Breakfast at the hotel & return to Srinagar
Visit Hazratbal Shrine & explore the old city
Take a relaxing stroll in the beautiful Tulip Garden (Seasonal - March to April)
Shopping for Kashmiri Pashmina shawls, carpets, and dry fruits
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Departure from Srinagar
details: Breakfast at the hotel & transfer to Srinagar Airport for your flight home

Trip Overview.Experience: Houseboat stay, Shikara ride, Gondola ride, snow activities

inclusions: 3-Night Accommodation (2 Nights in Srinagar, 1 Night in Gulmarg)
Shikara Ride on Dal Lake (1 Hour)
Gondola Cable Car Ride (Phase 1) in Gulmarg

things-to-do.title: Srinagar:
details: Enjoy a Shikara Ride on Dal Lake
Visit Shankaracharya Temple for panoramic views
Explore Mughal Gardens (Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, Chashme Shahi)
Stay in a traditional houseboat on Dal Lake
Try authentic Kashmiri Wazwan cuisine

things-to-do.title: Gulmarg:
details: Ride the Gondola Cable Car (up to Phase 1)
Experience skiing and snowboarding (in winter)
Visit Maharani Temple and St. Mary's Church
Enjoy a pony ride through scenic meadows

package_name: Wonderful Srinagar with Sonmarg: 3 Nights 4 Days
package_description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Kashmir with this 3 Nights / 4 Days tour covering Srinagar and Sonmarg. Stay in a traditional houseboat, take a Shikara ride on Dal Lake, and explore the famous Mughal Gardens in Srinagar. Then, head to Sonmarg, the ‘Meadow of Gold,’ where you can enjoy a pony ride to Thajiwas Glacier, explore snow-covered landscapes, and soak in stunning Himalayan views. This package is perfect for honeymooners, families, and nature lovers who want a peaceful yet adventurous getaway.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Local Sightseeing
details: Arrive at Srinagar Airport & transfer to your hotel/houseboat
Enjoy a Shikara ride on Dal Lake
Visit Shankaracharya Temple & Mughal Gardens
Explore Lal Chowk market for Kashmiri handicrafts
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Excursion to Sonmarg
details: Breakfast at the hotel & drive to Sonmarg (Approx. 2.5-hour drive)
Enjoy a pony ride to Thajiwas Glacier (Optional)
Explore snow-covered meadows & the Sindh River
Relax in the serene surroundings with mesmerizing views
Dinner & overnight stay in Sonmarg

itinerary.title: Return to Srinagar & Sightseeing
details: Breakfast at the hotel & return to Srinagar
Visit Hazratbal Shrine & explore the old city
Take a relaxing stroll in the beautiful Tulip Garden (Seasonal - March to April)
Shopping for Kashmiri Pashmina shawls, carpets, and dry fruits
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Departure from Srinagar
details: Breakfast at the hotel & transfer to Srinagar Airport for your flight home

Trip Overview.Experience: Houseboat stay, Shikara ride, lush meadows, Thajiwas Glacier trek

inclusions: 3-Night Accommodation (2 Nights in Srinagar, 1 Night in Sonmarg)
Shikara Ride on Dal Lake (1 Hour)
Trip to Thajiwas Glacier (Pony Ride at Additional Cost)

things-to-do.title: Srinagar:
details: Enjoy a Shikara Ride on Dal Lake

Explore lush meadows & scenic viewpoints
Take breathtaking photos of snow-capped peaks

package_name: Trip to Srinagar & Pahalgam: 3 Nights 4 Days
package_description: Experience the best of Kashmir with this 3 Nights / 4 Days package covering Srinagar and Pahalgam. Stay in a traditional houseboat on Dal Lake in Srinagar, take a peaceful Shikara ride, and explore the iconic Mughal Gardens. Then, journey to Pahalgam, known for its picturesque landscapes, lush meadows, and the famous Betaab Valley. Enjoy trekking, nature walks, and river rafting (seasonal), making this package perfect for those seeking both relaxation and adventure.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Local Sightseeing
details: Arrive at Srinagar Airport & transfer to hotel/houseboat
Relax & enjoy a Shikara Ride on Dal Lake
Visit Mughal Gardens (Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, Chashme Shahi)
Explore Shankaracharya Temple for panoramic views
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Journey to Pahalgam & Sightseeing
details: Breakfast at the hotel/houseboat
Transfer to Pahalgam (Approx. 2.5-hour drive)
Visit Betaab Valley for scenic beauty & photography
Explore Aru Valley for nature walks and breathtaking views
Optional pony ride to Baisaran Valley
Dinner & overnight stay in Pahalgam

itinerary.title: Return to Srinagar & Sightseeing
details: Breakfast at the hotel & return to Srinagar
Visit Hazratbal Shrine
Take a stroll through Lal Chowk for shopping
Enjoy local Kashmiri delicacies
Dinner & overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Departure from Srinagar
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Transfer to Srinagar Airport for your return flight

Trip Overview.Experience: Houseboat stay, Shikara ride, trekking, nature walks

inclusions: 3-Night Accommodation (2 Nights in Srinagar, 1 Night in Pahalgam)

Visit to Mughal Gardens, Betaab Valley, and Aru Valley

things-to-do.title: In Srinagar:

Explore Shankaracharya Temple
Take a stroll through Lal Chowk market
Visit Hazratbal Shrine

things-to-do.title: In Pahalgam:
details: Visit Betaab Valley for breathtaking views
Explore Aru Valley (ideal for nature walks and photography)
Take a pony ride to Baisaran Valley (known as “Mini Switzerland”)
River Rafting on Lidder River (seasonal)
Enjoy a nature walk or trek around Pahalgam's meadows

package_name: Peaceful Kashmir with Gulmarg & Srinagar: 4 Nights 5 Days
package_description: Experience the best of Kashmir with this 4 Nights / 5 Days package, featuring 2 nights in Srinagar (with a stay on a houseboat and visits to iconic sites like Mughal Gardens) and 2 nights in Gulmarg, known for its snow-covered landscapes and adventure sports. This package is perfect for travelers looking to blend relaxation, nature exploration, and winter activities. From a Shikara ride on Dal Lake in Srinagar to skiing in Gulmarg (seasonal), this package offers something for everyone.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Local Sightseeing
details: Arrive at Srinagar Airport and transfer to the hotel/houseboat
Relax and enjoy a Shikara Ride on Dal Lake
Visit Mughal Gardens (Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, Chashme Shahi)
Explore the Shankaracharya Temple for panoramic views of Srinagar
Dinner and overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Srinagar Sightseeing & Journey to Gulmarg
details: Breakfast at the hotel/houseboat
Visit Hazratbal Shrine

Explore the meadows of Gulmarg
Cable car ride on the Gulmarg Gondola (ride to Apharwat Peak, weather permitting)
Dinner and overnight stay in Gulmarg

itinerary.title: Adventure Day in Gulmarg
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Full day for winter sports activities: Skiing, snowboarding, or sledging (seasonal)
Pony ride around Khilanmarg or a nature walk
Enjoy the picturesque views and relax in the snow-covered landscapes
Dinner and overnight stay in Gulmarg

inclusions: 4-Night Accommodation (2 Nights in Srinagar, 2 Nights in Gulmarg)

Visit to Mughal Gardens and Shankaracharya Temple

package_name: Couple Special in Kashmir: 4 Nights 5 Days
package_description: The 4 Nights / 5 Days Honeymoon Package is designed for couples who seek romance, tranquility, and adventure. Start your honeymoon with a stay in Srinagar, where you will enjoy the picturesque Dal Lake and the historic Mughal Gardens. After a romantic experience in Srinagar, head to Gulmarg, a winter wonderland with snow activities, skiing, and meadow walks. The combination of these two destinations ensures a relaxing yet adventurous honeymoon experience.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar & Houseboat Stay
details: Arrive at Srinagar Airport
Transfer to your houseboat on Dal Lake
Enjoy a romantic Shikara Ride on Dal Lake
Explore the Mughal Gardens (Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh)
Experience a Kashmiri Wazwan dinner on the houseboat
Overnight stay on the houseboat in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Explore Srinagar & Transfer to Gulmarg
details: Breakfast at the houseboat
Visit Hazratbal Shrine and Shankaracharya Temple for panoramic views of Srinagar
Free time for shopping at Lal Chowk or visiting the floating market
Transfer to Gulmarg (Approx. 2.5-hour drive)
Check-in to your romantic hotel in Gulmarg
Evening at leisure for a nature walk or visit the St. Mary’s Church
Overnight stay in Gulmarg

itinerary.title: Gulmarg - Snow Adventure & Romance
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Take the Gulmarg Gondola Ride to Apharwat Peak
Engage in snow activities like skiing, snowboarding, and snowshoeing (seasonal)
Enjoy a romantic pony ride through Gulmarg’s meadows
Optional: Cable Car Ride to Kongdoori for more scenic views
Evening at leisure with a romantic candlelight dinner
Overnight stay in Gulmarg

itinerary.title: Transfer to Srinagar & Sightseeing
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Transfer back to Srinagar
Explore more Mughal Gardens and enjoy a leisure stroll
Visit Shankaracharya Temple for the panoramic view of Srinagar
Shopping for Kashmiri handicrafts and dry fruits at Lal Chowk
Optional: Visit the Hazratbal Shrine or explore local markets
Overnight stay in Srinagar

itinerary.title: Departure from Srinagar
details: Breakfast at the hotel
Free time for last-minute sightseeing or shopping
Transfer to Srinagar Airport for your departure

Trip Overview.Experience: A perfect honeymoon package blending romance, adventure, and the serene beauty of Srinagar’s lakes and Gulmarg’s snowy landscapes, this 5-day package provides an unforgettable experience with scenic beauty, luxury stays, snow activities, and cultural exploration.

inclusions: 4 Nights Accommodation (2 Nights in Srinagar, 2 Nights in Gulmarg)
Shikara Ride on Dal Lake (1 Hour)

details: Shikara Ride on Dal Lake
Visit the Mughal Gardens (Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, and Chashme Shahi)
Explore the floating market and buy Kashmiri handicrafts
Visit Hazratbal Shrine and Shankaracharya Temple
Enjoy a candlelight dinner at a cozy restaurant or houseboat

things-to-do.title: In Gulmarg (Adventure & Romance):
details: Gulmarg Gondola Ride to Apharwat Peak

Enjoy a romantic walk amidst snow-capped mountains
